Hydras:

Hydras arried at the room in the centre was a sort of big circle 3d 
holo-proyector. Hyras waited until Maxima arrive, then he closed the 
door and push a button and it showed a volcano

> She followed him to the command room. A slight smirk upon her face 
as she 
> followed him. What sensations she felt, & was so undescribable as 
well. But at

towards Hydras. 
> He was her commander after all. & She would serve him to the best 
of her 
> ability.
